titleInfo.title: WASABI as a case study of how misattribution of emotion can be modelled computationally

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Becker-Asano, Christian, and Wachsmuth, Ipke. 2010. “WASABI as a case study of how misattribution of emotion can be modelled computationally”. In Blueprint for Affective Computing, ed. K.R. Scherer, T. Bänzinger, and E.B. Roesch, 179-193. Oxford: Oxford University Press.
